source.sqlReaderQuery:
select PURCHASE_NUM,T_ORG_DELIVER.SUPPLIER_CODE,T_ORG_DELIVER.warehouse_code,T_ORG_DELIVER.warehouse_name,T_ORG_DELIVER.DELIVERY_DATE, 
T_ORG_DELIVER_ITEM.PRODUCT_CODE,T_ORG_DELIVER_ITEM.PRODUCT_NAME,SHIPPED_QTY,T_PO_PURCHASE_ORDER.MESSAGE ,
T_ORG_DELIVER.DEALER_CODE,T_ORG_DELIVER.DOCUMENT_NUM,RECEIVE_DEALER_CODE,t_bi_dealer.NAME as DEALER_NAME
from T_ORG_DELIVER 
left join T_ORG_DELIVER_ITEM on T_ORG_DELIVER_ITEM.DELIVER_ID =T_ORG_DELIVER.id
left join T_PO_PURCHASE_ORDER on T_PO_PURCHASE_ORDER.SO_NUM = PURCHASE_NUM
left join t_bi_dealer on t_bi_dealer.CODE = T_ORG_DELIVER.DEALER_CODE
where T_ORG_DELIVER.DOCUMENT_NUM is not null and (DOCUMENT_TYPE = 'fitting' or DOCUMENT_TYPE is null)  and T_ORG_DELIVER_ITEM.PRODUCT_CODE is not null

activities.name: Copy_FittingBarcode
activities.description: 统合销售一代价信息返回给wx数据库（配件库）

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select [FittingBarcode].*,P.BasicPrice from [FittingBarcode] 
  left join ods.SAPProductPrice P on P.ProductNo = [FittingBarcode].good_code

SELECT A.* ,REPLACE(LOWER([crm].[SysUser].[LoginName]),'sysmexcn\','') as [LoginName]
  FROM [crm].[ServiceInvoice] A
  left join [crm].[SysUser] on [crm].[SysUser].[SysUserId] = A.[CreatedBy]
  where A.[CreatedOn] >=N'2020-04-01'

/****** SSMS 的 SelectTopNRows 命令的脚本  ******/
SELECT  A.[OwnerId]
,REPLACE(LOWER([crm].[SysUser].[LoginName]),'sysmexcn\','') as [LoginName]
,crm.[SysUser].[DisplayName]
      ,[WarrantyApplyId]
      ,A.[Name]
      ,A.[Account]
	  ,crm.AccountBase.Name as AccountName
      ,[ConName]
      ,[Contact]
      ,[Installation]
      ,[InstallDate]
      ,A.[Invoice]
,A.PassDate
	  ,[crm].[ServiceInvoice].other
      ,[Product]
      ,[ProductNo]
      ,[ProductNo2]
      ,[Receive]
  FROM [crm].[ServiceWarrantyApply] A
    left join [crm].[SysUser] on [crm].[SysUser].[SysUserId] = A.[CreatedBy]
	left join [crm].[ServiceInvoice] on [crm].[ServiceInvoice].InvoiceId = A.Invoice
	left join crm.AccountBase on crm.AccountBase.AccountID = A.Account
  where A.[CreatedOn] >=N'2020-04-01' and A.Invoice is not null and A.isDeleted = 0

select crm.ServicePartsList.*,[crm].[SysUser].[DisplayName],[crm].[DealerUser].[DisplayName] as DealerUserName,crm.dealerbase.DealerId,crm.dealerbase.Name as DealerName,ServerBI_Base_维修单.维修编号,
  ServerBI_Base_维修单.医院ID ,客户名称,仪器ID,装机全称
  from crm.ServicePartsList 
left join 
[crm].[SysUser] on [crm].[SysUser].sysuserid = crm.ServicePartsList.createdby
left join [crm].[DealerUser] on [crm].[DealerUser].[DealerUserId] = crm.ServicePartsList .[DealerUserId]
left join crm.dealerbase on crm.dealerbase.DealerId = [crm].[DealerUser].dealerid
left join dbo.ServerBI_Base_维修单 on ServerBI_Base_维修单.服务单ID = crm.ServicePartsList.Service
where crm.ServicePartsList.createdon >= '2020-04-01'

activities.name: Copy_PrintedKit
activities.description: 条码库保养包条码打印数据同步到配件库

activities.name: Copy_ProductMDM_barcode
activities.description: DMS的物料数据，用于查询哪些是配件，还有属于配件的耗材，未来需要改成从MDM获取

source.sqlReaderQuery:
/****** SSMS 的 SelectTopNRows 命令的脚本  ******/
SELECT [id]
      ,[BASIC_PRICE]
      ,[CATEGORY_CODE]
      ,[CODE]
      ,[NAME]
      ,[OLDCODE]
      ,[ZMANA]
  FROM [T_ORG_PRODUCT]
  where PRODH = '00500' or CATEGORY_CODE = 300 and IS_DELETED = 'F'
